input_text:
Job Title: Mainframe z/OS Physical and Logical DB2 Database Administrator (DBA)

Location: Albany, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Production

Description:
Mainframe z / OS Physical and Logical Db2 Database Administrator (DBA)

Job Number: 24-01163

Drive innovation through technology solutions! Eclaro’s client is looking for a Mainframe z / OS Physical and Logical Db2 Database Administrator (DBA) in Albany, NY.

Eclaro’s client is the world’s largest IT infrastructure services provider, supporting diverse industries including banking and financial, chemical, oil and gas, government, healthcare, manufacturing and retail. If you’re up to the challenge, then take a chance at this rewarding opportunity!

Responsibilities:

Incident and Problem resolution based on customer Service Level requirements. Execute DB Utilities (Reorg, Runstats, Copy, Load, Unload, Modify, Check, Recover, Rebuild). Proficiently write new and modify existing JCL. Execute Db2 Commands (Stop, Start, Display, Cancel, etc.). Resolve problems, document solutions, and implement changes. Db2 Security (RACF, Grants, Revokes, Roles, Privileges). 

Required Qualifications:

At least 5 years’ experience with Db2 z / OS, 3 years with v11 / v12. At least 5 years’ experience with z / OS, JCL, TSO / ISPF, and Db2 Utilities. At least 5 years’ experience with executing DDL. At least 5 years’ experience in Capacity / Performance Management. At least 5 years’ experience with Db2 Backup / Recovery. At least 5 years’ experience in Apply Problem Solving Techniques. At least 5 years’ experience in Database Monitoring. At least 5 years’ experience in Database Maintenance and Administration. 

Preferred Experience:

At least 7 years’ experience with Db2 z / OS, 4 years with v11 / v12. At least 7 years’ experience with z / OS, JCL, TSO / ISPF, and Db2 Utilities. At least 7 years’ experience with executing DDL. At least 7 years’ experience in Capacity / Performance Management. At least 7 years’ experience with Db2 Backup / Recovery. At least 7 years’ experience in Apply Problem Solving Techniques. At least 7 years’ experience in Database Monitoring. 

Pay Rate: $55 - $60 / hr.

If hired, you will enjoy the following Eclaro Benefits:

401k Retirement Savings Plan administered by Merrill LynchCommuter Check Pretax Commuter BenefitsEligibility to purchase Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance through Eclaro

If interested, you may contact:

Carlo Flores

Carlo.Flores@eclaro.com

6466952934

Carlo Flores | LinkedIn

Equal Opportunity Employer: Eclaro values diversity and does not discriminate based on Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

Experience Level (if available): None
